first_para: Philip Ian "Phil" Hope (born 19 April 1955) is a former British Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Corby from 1997 until 2010, when he lost his seat to the Conservatives. He held several ministerial roles during his time as an MP. Since January 2011 he has been co-director of ImprovingCare.

full.extract:
Philip Ian "Phil" Hope (born 19 April 1955) is a former British Labour Co-operative politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Corby from 1997 until 2010, when he lost his seat to the Conservatives. He held several ministerial roles during his time as an MP. Since January 2011 he has been co-director of ImprovingCare.
^ "Improving Care". Retrieved 2 Feb 2013.
full.title: Phil Hope
